document_data.name: Shield of Balduran
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Shield of Balduran''''' was the [[shield]] wielded by the legendary explorer [[Balduran]].
document_data.Powers: This ''+3 shield'' made the wielder feel weak, but possessed the powerful ability to reflect the eye rays of [[beholder]]s.
document_data.History: Along with his [[Sword of Balduran|sword]] and [[Plate of Balduran|armor]], Balduran's shield was stolen from a museum in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]]. At some point it came into the inventory of [[Deidre]], a merchant from ''[[Aurora's Magic Emporium]]'', who did business from the [[Adventurer Mart]] located in [[Amn]]ian the city of [[Athkatla]].
